title: Settlement statements (HUD-1, ALTA)
dataVerified: Buyer/seller names, addresses, lender, settlement agent, transaction amounts
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent closing documents. Domain binding verifies settlement agent/escrow company. Tax deduction verification (mortgage interest). Prevents wire fraud targeting closing funds. Multi-page: Each statement page can verify independently.
